    public interface ModelUser
extends utility.observer.javaobserver.UnnamedPropertyChangeSubject
    Interface containing methods related functionalities to of the system created for the shop's customers

                                                   java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> categories)

        Parameters:
        address - String containing address of the shop
        categories - list of categories from which the product should have at least one
        Returns:
        list products filtered by categories and located at certain shop

        order - order which status should be changed and saved

                         Item item,
                         int quantityOfItem)
        Method updating stock of the shop after removing item from order
        Parameters:
        address - String containing address of the shop where order is being completed
        item - item that was removed from order
        quantityOfItem - number representing how many items should be returned to the stock

      • getLowestPriceOfProduct

        double getLowestPriceOfProduct​(java.lang.String address,
                               Product product)
        Method returning the lowest price from items that are certain product
        Parameters:
        address - String containing address of the shop where items are located
        product - product object representing "type" of item
        Returns:
        double being the lowest price from list of all prices of items that are "type" of passed product

      • getQuantityOfCertainProduct

        Parameters:

        product - product object representing "type" of item
        Returns:

        Parameters:

        expirationDate - expiration date of item
        productId - number of product of which type is item
        Returns:
